markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 3" pfs="Standard">[Ghostly Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=1146)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 23</row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your body becomes insubstantial as you partially phase out. You gain resistance 2 to all damage (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75)).

---
**Heightened (+2)** The resistance increases by 1.

---

<column gap="tiny">
**Amp** Your insubstantiality is complete enough that you can pass through other creatures, causing painful interference effects when you do so. Once each round when you Stride, [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=93), [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39), or [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94), you can pass through one creature's space during that action without needing to attempt a check to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29), though you can't end your turn in its space. When you pass through a creature's space in this way, you deal 2d6 force damage to that creature, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save.

**Amp Heightened (+2)**
Increase the damage dealt by phasing through a creature by 1d6.
</column>
name: Ghostly Shift
